SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ROUND AS ROUND, HP, RECENT_HP AS RECENTHP, ITEM AS ITEM, POSITION, POINT, (SELECT BROWNIE_POINT FROM BROWNIE_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) AS BROWNIEPOINT, RECENT_MAP AS RECENTMAP, QUEST, DICETIMES FROM BROWNIE_MARBLE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BROWNIE_MARBLE(USER_ID, ROUND, HP, ITEM, POSITION, POINT, RECENT_MAP, QUEST, DICETIMES, RECENT_HP) VALUES (#{userId}, 1, 3, '0,0,0,0', 0, 100, #{recentMap}, #{quest}, 8, 3)
mapper.update: UPDATE BROWNIE_MARBLE SET ROUND = #{round}, HP = #{hp}, ITEM = #{item}, POSITION = #{position}, RECENT_MAP = #{recentMap}, QUEST = #{quest}, DICETIMES = #{dicetimes}, RECENT_HP = #{recentHp} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT NICK_NAME FROM BROWNIE_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) AS USERID, ROUND, LOG_SEQ AS LOGSEQ, DICENUM, (SELECT to_char(TIME, 'rr.mm.dd/HH24:MI') FROM dual) AS TIME, OBJECT, ACT, RESULT FROM BROWNIE_MARBLE_LOG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROUND = #{round} ORDER BY LOG_SEQ DESC
